activities: Ziff Davis, LLC and its wholly-owned US subsidiaries IGN Entertainment, Inc. and Ookla, LLC use personal information that it receives from the EU and Switzerland primarily for marketing services and products to our customers.  Such marketing activities include displaying online ads, newsletters, conducting contests, competitions or sweepstakes and e-commerce activities.  Ziff Davis, LLC, its UK subsidiary Ziff Davis International Ltd. and its Irish subsidiary Ziff Davis Ireland Limited may collect personal information of individuals who work for Ziff Davis International Ltd. or Ziff Davis Ireland Limited solely for business purposes, including those required by governmental agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: User Data and Human Resources Data.  Such data includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: For Human Resource Data, we use the European Union Data Protection Authorities. For all other data, we use TRUSTe.
